welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mulheim, where the picturesque riverfront and historic old town await you. Known for its beautiful parks and vibrant cultural scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Essen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
